Package cs4620.ray1.shader

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClampTexture
    A Texture class that treats UV-coordinates outside the [0.0, 1.0] range as if they were at the nearest image boundary.
    Lambertian
    A Lambertian material scatters light equally in all directions.
    Phong
    A Phong material.
    RepeatTexture
    A Texture class that repeats the texture image as necessary for UV-coordinates outside the [0.0, 1.0] range.
    RGBNormals  
    Shader
    This interface specifies what is necessary for an object to be a shader.
    Texture
    This class represents a simple 2D texture implementation for a shader.
